item.title: Installing GoDaddy SSL Certificate on Ubuntu
item.description: Basically in order to successfully install an SSL certificate you need the following things CSR file Private key Certificate key Certificate chain Download Certificates If your website is hosted through GoDaddy (e.g. the primary domain on a GoDaddy shared hosting account, Website Builder), you donâ€™t need to use these instructions; GoDaddy take care of the SSL installation for you. On your SSL certificate home page, click Download.
